long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The QorePlugin extension is specifically for Qore network members and designed only to work on Qore network website.

It enables the intelligent feature to automatically highlight the defined keywords on any website that will help to easily identify the useful information to enhance the productivity.

Drops X-Frame Options and Content Security Policy HTTP response headers, allowing all pages to be iframed. Also providing the feature to copy URL by right clicking anywhere in the I-Frame.
